mapper.insert: insert into `RealAuth` (realName, sex, birthDate, idNumber, address, state, image1, image2, remark, auditTime, applyTime, auditor_id, applier_id) values (#{realName}, #{sex}, #{birthDate}, #{idNumber}, #{address}, #{state}, #{image1}, #{image2}, #{remark}, #{auditTime}, #{applyTime}, #{auditor.id}, #{applier.id})
mapper.update: update `RealAuth` set realName = #{realName}, sex = #{sex}, birthDate = #{birthDate}, idNumber = #{idNumber}, address = #{address}, state = #{state}, image1 = #{image1}, image2 = #{image2}, remark = #{remark}, auditTime = #{auditTime}, applyTime = #{applyTime}, auditor_id = #{auditor.id}, applier_id = #{applier.id} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select ra.id, ra.realName, ra.sex, ra.birthDate, ra.idNumber, ra.address, ra.state, ra.image1, ra.image2, ra.remark, ra.auditTime, ra.applyTime, ap.id ap_id,ap.username ap_username,au.id au_id,au.username au_username from `RealAuth` ra join logininfo ap on ra.applier_id = ap.id left join logininfo au on ra.auditor_id = au.id where id = #{id}
